greatings.help: Start the meeting by saying "It's meeting time"

ending.match: Happy writing and see you next week
ending.help: End the meeting by saying 'Happy writing and see you next week :)'

format.name: format
format.help: Call me with 'format' to get the minutes done (this will end the meeting). If you don't want to use the default format, you can add a format: It can be 'raw', 'MarkDown', 'WikiMedia', or 'HTML'

action.label: Action items
action.help: To record an action item, just type 'ACTION' followed by what must be record

section.help: Type '---' follow by a section name to create that section

topic.help: Type 'Next topic is ' follow by a topic name to create the related section

begin: Okay, I record this meeting now.
I wish you a peacefull meeting
record: In the era to come, your commitment will be salute.
